headline: The Human Utility seeks to eliminate water service disconnections for√¢¬Ä¬¶
description:
Founded July 2014, The Human Utility (formerly known as the Detroit Water Project) matches families needing help with utility bills to people who want to help through payments directly to utility companies.

For over 40 million families in the United States, water and other essential utilities may be unaffordable. In order to afford utilities, families often forgo medication, food, and transportation. The Human Utility's platform divides a bill similar to a loan syndicate expanding the possible number of donors from around the world able to join together to ensure families never lose access to utility service. Donors are matched with a specific family or donate to a universal assistance fund.

Later, we use utility data to design interventions addressing the root causes of why people need help with their utility bills with the goal of never having them lose service again.

# We believe affordable water is a human right. Do you?
####  People who believe paid [$93,681 in water bills (click/tap for listing)](https://www.detroitwaterproject.org/<https:/www.detroitwaterproject.org/transparency>) in 2024. 
Since July 2014, over 4,500 people who believe water is a human right have helped over 2,000 families with their water bills. 
[ Yes, I want to help with a water bill ](https://www.detroitwaterproject.org/<https:/www.classy.org/give/351246/#!/donation/checkout>) [ I need help with my water bill ](https://www.detroitwaterproject.org/</people/new>)
## Dignity for everyone, everyday.
**Water is a human right.** But, the United States has a water affordability problem. In places like Detroit, Baltimore, and other cities, families unable to afford their water bills have their water shut off. When this happens, kids can't bathe, people can't wash dishes, and grandparents can't flush their toilets. **The Human Utility is non-profit organization providing help to families and makes sure they _always_ have running water at home.**
